name: Magister Labyrinthus
description:
Magister Labyrinthus is a randomly generated action RPG Rogue-like shooter. Choose your animal, fight enemies and escape from the maze.  Choose wisely your rewards. 

Features

  • 4 playable animals (mouse, frog, cat and rabbit)
  • 100+ items
  • 10+ enemies
  • Full Controller Support
  • Translated in English and Italian (German and French will come soon)

Follow us on Twitter. We would love to hear your suggestions on our Discord server!
